title: Everglades National Park: Support Your Park
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Support Your Park             Support Your Park      Supporting your favorite park can be as simple as picking up a single piece of trash during your stay, or as intense as a six-month-long committment in the backcountry.  Groups, associations, volunteers and everyday park visitors all have the potential to contribute in some way to the protection of our national treasures.      VOLUNTEER As a volunteer (VIP), you can support Everglades National Park by contributing your time in a wide array of opportunities. more... DONATE Donations are accepted and can be directly designated to benefit a favorite program or the park in general. more... JOIN OUR FRIENDS GROUP The South Florida National Parks Trust works to ensure more people experince and learn about the resources protected by the park. more... PLACE A PARK EXHIBIT AT YOUR FACILITY Everglades National Park has a suite of traveling exhibits and displays that can be featured at any facility in the local community. From schools and libraries, to shopping malls, banks, and hotels. Help us spread the word about the resources and opportunities at Everglades National Park. Click here to learn more!      Public support is a critical component in the management of National Park Service lands. No other federal agency relies as heavily on the generosity and kindness of its visitors, volunteers, and donors and we thank you for your past support and look forward to future partnerships.
